label: Binary sum of all 71 gates
reason: Omega Hash is the verification seal itself. This gate validates the integrity of all 71 preceding gates. When all gates are correctly locked, the binary XOR of their verification hashes equals zero.
note: TERMINAL: Binary sum of all 71 gates = 0. This is the final integrity seal of the 72-Gate system. v22: Omega seal format v22-12PAIR-Bridge12x(2,0) with chi_eff=72 architecture verified across all certificates.
